Title: Establishes the incontinence supplies insurance program for Medicaid beneficiaries
Summary: Establishes the incontinence supplies insurance program for Medicaid beneficiaries who are also residents of the state of New York and obtain a note from a physician indicating a need for an item in accordance with subdivision one of this section.
LawCode: Add ยง363-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing the incontinence supplies insurance program for Medicaid beneficiaries
